message: Let's be fair, I'll take the bigger share this round, but I'll be more generous in the future if you accept.
Let's split the difference this time, Alice.  I'm feeling more generous than your last offer!
This time I'm offering a split closer to even. Let's get this done!
Okay Alice, let's meet closer to the middle. This is a fair offer considering the time pressure!
